data.description:
From the creators of **Job Simulator** comes an all new omniversal hand tracked cooperative multiplayer game: **Dimensional Double Shift!**

Assemble a team of up to 4 friends to run the Gas N’ Grill, an omnidimensional diner and garage. Work your hardest to please your “helpful” AI manager ALICE, or ignore her — she’s only a hologram. Fix, refuel, shred, smash, and torch as you help the citizens of the omniverse. The balance of floating roadside convenience rests in you and your friends’ hands!

* **Co-Working Chaos**: Crack some eggs, weld some pipes and grab your friends or frenemies to clock in for a Gas N’ Grill double shift.
* **Multi-dimensional Mayhem:** Travel across the omniverse to different dimensions and serve their inhabitants. The real on-the-job training begins now!
* **Spacetime Busting Humor**: Conglomni Corp. believes in a better tomorrow, from its lowliest workers to its most genius executives. Laugh through the tears of endless shift work with cheeky and provocative humor.
* **Rewards fit for the Corporate Treadmill:** Is there a wage? Of course! If by wage you mean corporate branded swag. Earn Conglomni rewards, the most fulfilling form of “payment” since team pizza parties.
* **Meet ALICE**: Conglomni Corp’s AI supervisor has been trained on the best data, and is ready to string together a series of words to keep you motivated! Corporate’s subcontracted outsourced programmers have moved beyond the GPT to the next generation GPC (Generally Probably Coherent). Don’t forget — she’s the boss!

changelog.change_log:
Diner

• Customers now dine in more frequently rather than taking their food to-go.  
• It’s now easier to grab clumps off of things on the grill, instead of grabbing the other thing by mistake.  
• Increased the size of the cooler top shelf to make it easier to grab items  
• Fixed an issue where opening and closing the cooler would spawn several items.  
• Made it so music plays for all players during the last call.  
• Shift progress screen no longer turns black sometimes for no good reason.  
• Fixed an issue where completed orders were counted incorrectly.  
• Diner Patrons can now hit each other with their food bags while moving in the Diner.  
• Order-up bell now always plays its SFX.  
• Items now remain functional after being attached to the sprayer and placed in the Blendification Station.  
• Fixed issue with raw eggs sometimes appearing cooked, go forth and prevent salmonella.  
• Fixed previous orders sometimes appearing briefly for other players on the serving tray.  
• Flambé torch no longer stays on when the trigger is not pressed. Sorry, fire enjoyers.  
• Salt Bacon can now be made successfully during the last call.  
• Thirst Quencher role can now pour clumps out of cups.  
• Liquid sprayer no longer gets stuck in the diner window.

Garage

• Added a nicer texture to the scraps at the Scrapper station.  
• Fixed an issue where the end-of-car pull cord in the garage is unreachable after some players disconnect.  
• Adjusted distance passing for the drill so the players grab it more naturally.  
• Vacuum can now clean mud off of car modules.  
• Adjusted player positions in the garage for two-player parties.  
• Improved reliability of cranks in the garage that lift up the tops of cars.  
• Computer virus minigame no longer requires you to move the joystick before hitting the button.  
• Fixed issue with vehicle parts hanging off the bottom of cars as they leave the garage.  
• Cleaned up some misbehaving car panels.  
• Water cooler jug is now visible to all players when held. 

ALICE, Toadtorials & NPCS

• Updated NPCs outfits and emotions.  
• Adjusted ALICE’s speech timing to fix her speech sometimes being muffled.  
• Fixed an error where ALICE would play "getting hit/thrown at" dialogue after teleporting at the end of a diner shift.  
• Toadtorials are more well-behaved, including when being thrown into the sky.   
• Toadtorials spark less when put into the Chop-Chop.  
• Fixes for NPC voices and captions.  
• Fixed issue where NPC hands sometimes showed up where they shouldn’t.

Login Room

• The Login Room keyborb will now continue functioning even if you lose internet connection.  
• Soda now pours more accurately from the hole of the soda can while the can is in a crushed state.  
• Changed the tablet in the Login Room from portrait to landscape.  
• Included better messaging when hand tracking is disabled or if you are holding controllers when starting the game.  
• Players can no longer access their wrist menu before receiving their wristband from ALICE  
• Holding the employee ID in the tutorial sequence no longer causes visual problems.  
• ALICE no longer hides behind the screen during the tutorial sequence at the beginning of the game (She was scared to meet so many new p̵l̵a̵y̵e̵r̵s̵ coworkers).  
• Improved timing of ALICE tutorial sequence.  
• Desk and props in the Login Room are now present during ALICE’s tutorial.

Avatars & Unlocks

• Improved the placement of the teeth for a couple of jaw options.  
• Adjusted name tags with white backgrounds to be easier to read and vertically centered the text.    
• Corrected the formatting for item descriptions in the Avatar Menu.  
• Fixed issue where titles sometimes unlocked for incorrect players.   
• Unlocks now use the correct SFX.  
• Sometimes you’d get a fish statue as a reward instead of the reward you earned. Not any more, babieeeee.  
• “Wear Now” and “Accept” squishable bubbles now appear as expected when unlocking an item.   
• Titles show their proper names instead of dev names you were totally not supposed to see.  
• Avatar customizations now display correctly for all players.  
• All rings from the VOLT2 collection are now attainable.  
• Can now get the title associated with the hint, “It’s flower. Not flour.”  
• Caffeinated Title now unlocks properly  
• Fixed lighting issue on earrings.  
• Adjusted ring customization UI to more accurately reflect left and right hands.  
• Fixed some hair coloration problems.   
• Made adjustments to some Title unlock triggers.

Multiplayer & Networking

• More graceful disconnect handling.  
• Disabled the "random party code" button in the Login scene.  
• Fixed an issue where Players will occasionally get "Party Full" errors when the party is not full.  
• Fixed party menu not showing the player attempting to join.  
• Blocked players can no longer rejoin a party.  
• New Player Incoming banner positioning has been adjusted to avoid clipping. 

Miscellaneous

• Improved performance; you can stop yelling at ALICE now.  
• Fixed a rare problem where players would get stuck on a loading screen when entering the game.   
• Enabled snapping on all squishable bubbles.  
• Shift portals now correctly appear for all players after quitting a shift.   
• Addressed the issue where items couldn’t be passed between player hands if they try to grab it in a different pose.  
• Fixed an issue where players joining a session in progress would occasionally spawn under the island.  
• Removed the ability for players to take tethered items from the garage and diner to the other area.  
• Fixed an issue where the end of shift Rewards Crate would fall through the table.  
• Fixed giving up on a shift very quickly causing the shift to not properly end.  
• Fixed issue where some items would sliiiiiiiide back into position when respawning after being destroyed.  
• SFX for completing a shift no longer plays when beginning a shift.   
• Putting your hand in the shift portals now triggers the correct SFX and visuals.  
• Rewards Crate should now break for all players.  
• Improved stability of rewards sequence.   
• Fixed overlaps between the clipboard and other objects during the shift reward sequence.  
• Fixed Shift Done logo appearing when it shouldn’t.  
• Developers have gotten more sleep 💤
